metadata.title: Seagate Momentus 5400.4 160GB SATA/300 5400RPM 8MB 2.5" Hard Drive
features: Serial ATA interface - 5400 RPM spindle speed
description: Enlarge your laptop’s storage capacity! This Seagate Momentus 5400.4 ST9160827AS 2.5-inch Hard drive allows you to store more on your laptop. Providing you with an enormous 160 GB storage capacity, you’ll never run out of room. With a quick SATA/300 connection, transferring files is easy. Also featuring a phenomenal 12ms average read seek time and a 14ms average write seek time, this Seagate Momentus 5400.4 hard drive is ready to improve your laptop’s storage abilities. Order today! WARNING: The solder used in this product contains lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects and other reproductive harm. Please wash hands after handling internal components and circuit boards and avoid inhalation of fumes if heating the solder. 180-DAY FACTORY RECERTIFIED WARRANTY
